channel.title: Rock Golems
channel.description: Does anyone know why RuneScape removed rock golems? If anyone has never encountered one or know what it is, they are monsters that attack you while mining. They are sort of like a random event, but you have to kill them.

item.title: Rock Golems
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

kickingjamie:

Have you been in a cave for the last few years?

I’ve been in a hole…

I accually killed goblins with a bronze sword until an iron scimitar droped. I was so happy.

[quote=“Travas, post:8, topic:437118”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=539832.msg3952182#msg3952182 date=1332376799]

The newer random events are definitely more sophisticated, so if we’re talking about stopping bots, the new ones would be better at it. Rather than merely running away from the golem, the player is teleported into an area which he cannot leave until the random task is completed.

However, I enjoyed the old random events more. The golem was always a challenge, as well as the shade, etc. The excitement I experienced after killing a high level NPC, etc.

I love a lot of things about the old RuneScape, but I like most of the graphical things they’ve added.

You can still get them by mining the rocks in the Enchanted Valley.

http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Enchanted_Valley

After how many times I’ve used the fairy ring I’ve never been there. Do you think you could get the coords to it?
[/quote]code is BKQ[/quote]

I mean the coordinates x and y so I could add it onto one of my server’s features.

Read full topic

item.title: Rock Golems
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:9, topic:437118”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=539832.msg3952188#msg3952188 date=1332377291]
I know everyone jumps on the bandwagon and says they like 2006 Runescape the most, but I really do miss it.
[/quote]
<3
Everytime some one says runescape 2006 my best memory flashes
The day I had my first 1000gp and bought my black longsword where i had been mining for for a week.
that was 05 though, but still (:[/quote]
Lol…So you started playing RS at 2005? That’s just you missing your noob days, not the 2006 content. I really miss the times I played RSC(My noobie days).

Read full topic
